participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to do stunts on my motorcycle.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I've always dreamed of living in the desert.
I used to run long distances, but my feet can't take it anymore.

participant_2.background:
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
i love basketball.
i ride my bicycle everywhere.
i work at the pizza parlor.
I get to show off my long fingernails.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing good, thanks! Where are you from?
I'm originally from Texas, but I moved to Australia a few years ago.
Oh that's cool, I've always wanted to visit Australia. What do you like about it there?
There's a lot to like, but I think the best part is the people. They're so friendly and welcoming.
That's great to hear! I'm sure they'd love to meet you.
I'm sure they would too! I'm always up for meeting new people.
What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to bike, play basketball, and go to the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love biking too, but I'm not very good at basketball.
It doesn't matter how good you are at basketball, it's still fun to play!
Yeah, you should come over and play with me sometime!
I'd love to! Let's exchange numbers.
